Uses of Package
com.github.mrm1st3r.connection

  • Packages that use com.github.mrm1st3r.connection 
    Package Description
    com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby
    Contains Activities and other classes used for creating and joining a game lobby.
    com.github.mrm1st3r.connection
    Utilities for easy management of Bluetooth connections.
    com.github.mrm1st3r.connection.bluetooth
    Contains classes for easy management and using of bluetooth connections.
  • Classes in com.github.mrm1st3r.connection used by com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby 
    Class and Description
    AsynchronousConnection 
    ThreadedConnection
    Base class for asynchronous and other connections that need to run an endless loop in a separate thread.
  • Classes in com.github.mrm1st3r.connection used by com.github.mrm1st3r.connection 
    Class and Description
    AsynchronousConnection 
    OnConnectionChangeHandler
    Event listener used to handle any connection state changes.
    OnReceivedHandler
    Handler for incoming data received by an AsynchronousConnection.
    ThreadedConnection
    Base class for asynchronous and other connections that need to run an endless loop in a separate thread.
  • Classes in com.github.mrm1st3r.connection used by com.github.mrm1st3r.connection.bluetooth 
    Class and Description
    AsynchronousConnection 
    OnConnectionChangeHandler
    Event listener used to handle any connection state changes.
    OnReceivedHandler
    Handler for incoming data received by an AsynchronousConnection.
    ThreadedConnection
    Base class for asynchronous and other connections that need to run an endless loop in a separate thread.
